languages.text: {n}Инквизитор смотрит на вас с интересом.{/n} "Это очень опасная игра, {name}. "Я использую меньшее зло, чтобы истребить большее, и я точно не проморгаю момент, когда меньшее зло под моей опекой превратится в великое" — так вы думали? Поверьте, любителям не стоит играть в подобные игры".

traits.locale_text: {n}Инквизитор смотрит на вас с интересом.{/n} "Я понимаю ваши мотивы, но вы заблуждаетесь. Ксеносы — менее страшная угроза, чем разложение в рядах Империума. Но, надеюсь, со временем вы осознаете свою ошибку".

languages.text: {n}Calcazar looks at you with interest.{/n} "That is a very dangerous game, {name}. 'I shall take the lesser evil under my protection and use it to exterminate the greater, and I will certainly not blink and miss the moment when the lesser evil becomes greater still' — were these your thoughts? Trust me, amateurs ought to stay away from such games."
languages.original_text: {n}Инквизитор смотрит на вас с интересом.{/n} "Это очень опасная игра, {name}. "Я использую меньшее зло, чтобы истребить большее, и я точно не проморгаю момент, когда меньшее зло под моей опекой превратится в великое" — так вы думали? Поверьте, любителям не стоит играть в подобные игры".

traits.locale_text: {n}Xavier looks at you with interest.{/n} "It is a very dangerous game, {name}. 'I shall use the lesser evil to exterminate the greater one, and I cannot possibly miss the moment when the lesser evil in my charge becomes the greater one' — were these your thoughts? Trust me, amateurs ought to stay away from such games."

languages.text: {n}カルカサルは興味深そうにあなたを見つめる。{/n}「実に危険なゲームだな、{name}よ。『私は下級悪魔を保護し、上級悪魔を根絶するためにそいつを使うつもりだ。また、この下級悪魔から片時も目を離さず、大きな力を持つ瞬間を見逃さない』、とでもいうのか？正直に言おう、素人はそのようなゲームから手を引くべきだ」
languages.original_text: {n}Calcazar looks at you with interest.{/n} "That is a very dangerous game, {name}. 'I shall take the lesser evil under my protection and use it to exterminate the greater, and I will certainly not blink and miss the moment when the lesser evil becomes greater still' — were these your thoughts? Trust me, amateurs ought to stay away from such games."

traits.locale_text: {n}カルカサルは興味深そうにあなたを見つめる。{/n}「実に危険なゲームだな、{name}よ。『私は下級悪魔を保護し、上級悪魔を根絶するためにそいつを使うつもりだ。また、この下級悪魔から片時も目を離さず、大きな力を持つ瞬間を見逃さない』、とでもいうのか？正直に言おう、素人はそのようなゲームから手を引くべきだ」

languages.original_text: {n}Calcazar looks at you with interest.{/n} "That is a very dangerous game, . 'I shall take the lesser evil under my protection and use it to exterminate the greater, and I will certainly not blink and miss the moment when the lesser evil becomes greater still' — were these your thoughts? Trust me, amateurs ought to stay away from such games."

languages.text: {n}卡尔卡扎饶有兴趣地看着你。{/n}“这个游戏太危险了，{name}。‘我要利用邪恶之人对付更加邪恶的敌人。当然了，我会时时刻刻擦亮眼睛，绝不会让这邪恶之人从中渔利，趁势坐大’——你是这样想的，对吧？听我一句劝，这不是外行该玩的游戏。”
languages.original_text: {n}Calcazar looks at you with interest.{/n} "That is a very dangerous game, {name}. 'I shall take the lesser evil under my protection and use it to exterminate the greater, and I will certainly not blink and miss the moment when the lesser evil becomes greater still' — were these your thoughts? Trust me, amateurs ought to stay away from such games."

traits.locale_text: {n}卡尔卡扎饶有兴趣地看着你。{/n}“这个游戏太危险了，{name}。‘我要利用邪恶之人对付更加邪恶的敌人。当然了，我会时时刻刻擦亮眼睛，绝不会让这邪恶之人从中渔利，趁势坐大’——你是这样想的，对吧？听我一句劝，这不是外行该玩的游戏。”

languages.text: {n}Calcazar te mira con sumo interés.{/n} «Es un juego muy peligroso, {name}. "Acogeré al mal menor bajo mi protección y lo usaré para exterminar el mayor, y desde luego no parpadearé y me perderé el momento en el que el mal menor va a mayores". ¿Era ese su plan? Hágame caso, esa clase de juegos no son nada recomendables para aficionad{mf|o|a}s».
languages.original_text: {n}Calcazar looks at you with interest.{/n} "That is a very dangerous game, {name}. 'I shall take the lesser evil under my protection and use it to exterminate the greater, and I will certainly not blink and miss the moment when the lesser evil becomes greater still' — were these your thoughts? Trust me, amateurs ought to stay away from such games."

traits.locale_text: {n}Calcazar te mira con sumo interés.{/n} «Es un juego muy peligroso, {name}. "Acogeré al mal menor bajo mi protección y lo usaré para exterminar el mayor, y desde luego no parpadearé y me perderé el momento en el que el mal menor va a mayores". ¿Era ese su plan? Hágame caso, esa clase de juegos no son nada recomendables para aficionad{mf|o|a}s».

languages.text: {n}Vos paroles semblent avoir éveillé l'intérêt de Calcazar.{/n} « Vous jouez à un jeu dangereux, {name}. "Je vais prendre le moindre mal sous ma protection et m'en servir pour exterminer la véritable menace, et il n'y a aucune chance que ce moindre mal devienne à son tour une menace dès que j'aurai le dos tourné"... Est-ce là ce que vous aviez en tête ? Ce genre de stratagème n'est pas pour les amateurs, croyez-moi. »
languages.original_text: {n}Calcazar looks at you with interest.{/n} "That is a very dangerous game, {name}. 'I shall take the lesser evil under my protection and use it to exterminate the greater, and I will certainly not blink and miss the moment when the lesser evil becomes greater still' — were these your thoughts? Trust me, amateurs ought to stay away from such games."

traits.locale_text: {n}Vos paroles semblent avoir éveillé l'intérêt de Calcazar.{/n} « Vous jouez à un jeu dangereux, {name}. "Je vais prendre le moindre mal sous ma protection et m'en servir pour exterminer la véritable menace, et il n'y a aucune chance que ce moindre mal devienne à son tour une menace dès que j'aurai le dos tourné"... Est-ce là ce que vous aviez en tête ? Ce genre de stratagème n'est pas pour les amateurs, croyez-moi. »

languages.text: {n}Calcazar blickt dich interessiert an.{/n} "Das ist ein sehr gefährliches Spiel, {name}. 'Ich beschütze das geringere Übel und benutze es, um das größere zu vernichten, und werde ganz sicher den Augenblick nicht verpassen, wenn das geringere Übel zum größeren wird' – waren das Eure Gedanken? Glaubt mir, Amateure sollten sich von solchen Spielen fernhalten."
languages.original_text: {n}Calcazar looks at you with interest.{/n} "That is a very dangerous game, {name}. 'I shall take the lesser evil under my protection and use it to exterminate the greater, and I will certainly not blink and miss the moment when the lesser evil becomes greater still' — were these your thoughts? Trust me, amateurs ought to stay away from such games."

traits.locale_text: {n}Calcazar blickt dich interessiert an.{/n} "Das ist ein sehr gefährliches Spiel, {name}. 'Ich beschütze das geringere Übel und benutze es, um das größere zu vernichten, und werde ganz sicher den Augenblick nicht verpassen, wenn das geringere Übel zum größeren wird' – waren das Eure Gedanken? Glaubt mir, Amateure sollten sich von solchen Spielen fernhalten."

languages.text: {n}Calcazar sana ilgiyle bakıyor.{/n} "Çok tehlikeli bir oyun oynuyorsun {name}. 'Daha az kötü olanı korumam altına alıp onu daha büyük bir kötülüğü yok etmekte kullanacağım ve bu sırada da gözümü kırpmayacağım ki daha az kötü olanın daha büyük bir kötülüğe dönüşeceği an gözümden kaçmasın' şeklinde mi düşündün? Güven bana, amatörler bu tip oyunlar oynamaktan kaçınmalıdır."
languages.original_text: {n}Calcazar looks at you with interest.{/n} "That is a very dangerous game, {name}. Trust me, amateurs ought to stay away from such games."
